tool_description: Generates comprehensive equipment checklists tailored to specific wedding event requirements, timeline, and venue characteristics.

event_type.description: Type of wedding event (ceremony_only, reception_only, full_day, destination, elopement)

venue_locations.description: List of venue locations (church, reception_hall, outdoor_garden, etc.)

special_requirements.description: Special equipment needs (drone, underwater, macro, video, livestream)

photographer_count.description: Number of photographers working the event

weather_backup.description: Whether weather backup equipment is needed

power_availability.description: Power availability at venues (full, limited, none)

setup_time.description: Available setup time in hours before event start

error_messages: Invalid event type: Use ceremony_only, reception_only, full_day, destination, or elopement.
Empty venue list: Provide at least one venue location.
Invalid duration: Event duration must be between 1 and 24 hours.
Invalid guest count: Guest count must be between 2 and 10000.
Invalid photographer count: Photographer count must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid power availability: Use full, limited, or none.
Invalid transportation method: Use car, flight, walking, or public_transport.
Invalid setup time: Setup time must be between 0.25 and 8 hours.
usage: Specify event details including type, venues, duration, guest count, and any special requirements. The tool will generate a comprehensive equipment checklist with priorities and backup considerations.

essential_equipment.description: Must-have equipment items for the event

recommended_equipment.description: Recommended additional equipment for optimal results

backup_equipment.description: Backup equipment based on event criticality

packing_priority.description: Equipment organized by packing and setup priority
